Description:
Design, plan, and manage product installations
Develop material and construction specifications, and attend coordination meetings
Oversee safety aspects of project, including daily contractor safety meetings
Coordinate with architects, contractors, and other project stakeholders
Maintain and update materials, equipment, and construction plans
Track project budgets and monitor expenditure against budget
Perform quality control inspections
Recruit, hire, train, and evaluate architectural, engineering, and support staff
Manage construction projects in compliance with established codes, standards, and regulations
Perform inspections to ensure compliance with project specifications
Develop project budgets
Plan and oversee construction and/or remodeling activitiesSkills
Skills:
Bachelor’s degree in architecture engineering or related field
3+ years’ proven experience as an architectural designer or architectural engineer
Excellent knowledge of AutoCAD & 3 D (ideally with Revit experience as well)
Ability to collaborate with clients, contractors, and subcontractors
Knowledge of building
